dmca.title: Someone's been spending too much time in their logcabin
dmca.body:
Hello Terry All Log Homes:

Regarding the copyright of log homes as the single work or word "loghomes" 
as used in loghomes.com and loghomes.net.

Be advised:

Using name "loghomes" is a copyright violation and theft of our good name. 
I have turned this domain name violation over to our attorneys to fully 
research a copyright violation. As soon as they come back with an 
enforceable violation I will bring an action against your company in the 
United States 10th District Court and seek damages.

You will be given thirty days to remove tarryall-loghomes.com from the 
entire Internet and to make such restitution as the Federal Courts have 
awarded in the past.
